projects.name: Kibera Solar Farm
projects.description: A 50MW solar installation providing clean energy to 25,000 households in the Kibera district, replacing diesel generators and reducing CO2 emissions by 45,000 tons annually.

projects.name: West Texas Wind Project
projects.description: 200 wind turbines generating 600MW of clean energy, offsetting coal power and preventing 320,000 tons of CO2 emissions per year.

projects.name: Amazon Rainforest Restoration
projects.description: Restoration of 10,000 hectares of degraded rainforest, sequestering 150,000 tons of CO2 while preserving biodiversity and supporting indigenous communities.

projects.name: Rural Biogas Initiative
projects.description: 5,000 biogas digesters installed in rural communities, converting agricultural waste to clean cooking fuel and preventing 30,000 tons of CO2 equivalent emissions.

projects.name: Pacific Blue Carbon
projects.description: Restoration of 5,000 hectares of coastal mangroves and seagrass beds, sequestering 80,000 tons of CO2 while protecting marine ecosystems.

projects.name: Reykjavik Geothermal Expansion
projects.description: Expansion of geothermal heating network eliminating fossil fuel heating for 15,000 homes, reducing CO2 emissions by 60,000 tons annually.

projects.name: Fjord Micro-Hydro Network
projects.description: Network of 20 micro-hydro installations providing renewable energy to remote communities, offsetting 25,000 tons of CO2 from diesel generators.

projects.name: Industrial Efficiency Retrofit
projects.description: Comprehensive efficiency upgrades to 50 industrial facilities, reducing energy consumption by 40% and preventing 100,000 tons of CO2 emissions.

projects.name: Clean Cookstove Distribution
projects.description: Distribution of 50,000 efficient cookstoves reducing wood consumption by 60% and preventing 40,000 tons of CO2 emissions annually.

projects.name: Bogotá Electric Bus Fleet
projects.description: Replacement of 500 diesel buses with electric vehicles, reducing urban air pollution and preventing 75,000 tons of CO2 emissions annually.
